name: Legions of Hell
description:
Survive endless waves of demons that are trying to devour your soul. Unfortunately you only managed to grab a single shot hand gun. Shoot a demon to be granted another bullet to slay as many demons as you can!

  1. Standard WASD movement
  2. Left click mouse to shoot where your cross-hairs are at.
  3. Kill as many demons as you can without dying
  4. You only get one bullet at a time

I made this for a 48 hour game jam.

https://gm48.net/game/730/legions-of-hell

If you have any suggestions for updates, please leave them in the comments :)
